website_summaries.verdict: Football Manager 2018 is an engrossing, addicting experience and one of the richest simulations available. Some interest in soccer is recommended for players of this top-notch sports title and uniquely capable storytelling vehicle.
pros: Huge number of clubs to manage
Hyper-detailed database, tactical options, and staff instructions
cons: Results can seem cruelly arbitrary on occasion

customer_reviews.title: Another good update
customer_reviews.text: It is hard sometimes to justify the price for what is a yearly update, but with some downloaded mods I find the game thoroughly enjoyable. I tend to see most of the new features as worthless, but the core game is still fun and immersive. As long as you can turn off all the 'extras' like doing interviews I am happy.

I don't want to individually train players or faff around with this or that, I just want to organise the team before and during matches, and buy & sell players - the rest is a bit unnecessary for me....but that's just me.

product_meta.title: Football Manager 2018
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Limited EditionFast-track your way to footballing history with the Football Manager 2018 Limited Edition. A double-sided “Management Masterclass” pull-out races you through your first steps in the digital dugout and gears you up for long-term success, helping you transform your team from contenders to champions and elevating you to managerial icon.

BOX CONTAINS
Disc, manual
feature_bullets: Try your hand in 50 of the biggest footballing countries
Win the title with any one of world’s top 2500 clubs
Play the transfer market with over 600,000 real players and staff
Watch your football vision come to life before your very eyes
